execution_quality: The agent executed the core push and PR creation successfully, but made an incorrect initial assumption about PR assignment that required user correction in the follow-up message.
work_category: Git and GitHub operations to push code, create a PR with version tagging, and configure PR assignment/review settings.
summary: The agent successfully pushed code and created a PR with version tagging, but assigned the PR to Sam when the user actually wanted it assigned to themselves with Sam's review requested instead. The user's follow-up clarification indicates a misunderstanding of the intent rather than satisfaction with the initial work. The task required a second iteration to correct the PR assignment and review configuration.
follow_up_pattern: User is clarifying the assignment/review model (assign to self, request review from Sam) rather than criticizing the work. This suggests the initial assignment was wrong and needed adjustment.
